author: Special Correspondent
text:
The India-U.S. working group on aircraft-carrier technology co-operation has held its second meeting here, Navy officials said on Friday.

The group was one of the two constituted under the Defence Trade and Technology Initiative during U.S. President Barack Obama’s visit to India in January last year. “At this meeting, various aspects of cooperation… were discussed and a joint statement was signed,” the Navy said in a statement
title: India-U.S. carrier group concludes second meet
